title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 262.3 - Special rules for real estate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 262.3 - Special rules for real estate

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 4(d) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-101(d)

Income from and deductions connected with the rental of
real property and gain and loss from the sale, exchange or other disposition of
real property are not subject to allocation under section
262.2
of this Part, but are considered as entirely derived from or connected with the
place in which such real property is located. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
262.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
